client.modal_buy_subscription: Are you sure you want to purchase a $%s for %s %s?
client.modal_buy_phone: Are you sure you want to purchase a Trap Phone for $%s?
client.phone_mole_buy_message: 'sup, I will keep you informed when Cops appear in my neighborhood. On the GPS, you have marked the area I cover.
client.notify_exit_vehicle: You need to exit the Vehicle.
client.notify_wholesale_info: You are very close to the meeting point, if you move away - you will cancel the meeting.
client.notify_wholesale_info2: If you pull out any weapon within the meeting area with the client, he will perceive it as an attempt to scam.
client.notify_wholesale_fail_weapon: The client took it as fraud. Your respect drops by %s.
client.notify_wholesale_fail_drug: You don't have enough of the specified drug, the client took it as fraud. Your respect drops by %s.
client.notify_wholesale_fail_distance: You canceled the meeting with the client, your respect drops by %s.
client.notify_wholesale_enemy_dead: Take the money from the client before the police arrive.

phone_mole_message: There's a pig patrolling the neighborhood, watch your back!
Heads up, there's a cop around, stay alert!
Be careful, there's a pig in the area, keep an eye out!
Watch out, there's a fuzz on the block, stay sharp!
Heads up, there's a five-o nearby, be on the lookout!

server.command_selldrugs_description: Command responsible for enabling/disabling Drug Sales
server.command_selldrugs_error: The player with the given ID does not exist.
server.command_checkstats_description: The command responsible for checking the drug sales statistics of a given player
server.command_checkstats_notify:
Checking: %s,

Respect: %s,
Sale Skill: %s,
Mole Junkie: %s
Mole Criminal: %s
Mole Professional: %s
server.command_addrespect_desc: The command responsible for adding reputation points in selling drugs for a selected player
server.command_addrespect_notify:
Adds Respect: %s,

After adding, it has %s respect points.
server.command_addrespect_notify2: The administrator has added respect points to you. After adding it, you have %s respect points.
server.command_addrespect_arg2_desc: Number of reputation points to add
server.command_removerespect_desc: The command responsible for subtracting reputation points in selling drugs for a selected player
server.command_removerespect_notify:
Subtracts Respect: %s,

After subtraction, it has %s respect points.
server.command_removerespect_notify2: The administrator has deducted your respect points. After deduction, you have %s respect points.
server.command_removerespect_args2_desc: The number of reputation points to be deducted
server.command_addskill_desc: The command responsible for adding skill points in selling drugs for the selected player
server.command_addskill_notify:
Adds Skill Points: %s,

After adding, it has %s skill points.
server.command_addskill_notify2: The administrator has added skill points to you. After adding them, you have %s skill points.
server.command_addskill_arg2_desc: Number of skill points to add
server.command_removeskill_desc: The command responsible for subtracting skill points in selling drugs for the selected player
server.command_removeskill_notify:
Subtracts Skill Points: %s,

After subtraction, he has %s skill points.
server.command_removeskill_notify2: The administrator has deducted your skill points. After subtraction, you have %s skill points.
server.command_removeskill_arg2_desc: Number of skill points to be subtracted
server.command_addMole_desc: Command responsible for adding an observer for a selected player

server.command_addMole_notify3:
Adding Subscriptions: %s,

Received subscription from %s: %s valid until %s.
server.command_addMole_notify4: You have received a subscription to %s: %s from the Administrator. Valid until %s.
server.command_addMole_arg2_desc: The Observer type can be found in config.lua
server.command_addMole_arg3_desc: The name of the Observer can be found in config.lua
server.command_removeMole_notify: The %s observer category does not exist.
server.command_removeMole_notify2: The player does not have this Follower: %s.
server.command_removeMole_notify4: The administrator has canceled your subscription to %s: %s.
server.command_removeMole_desc: Command responsible for removing an observer for a selected player
server.notify_subscription_ends: Your subscription to %s has just expired.
server.notify_wholesale_time: The stranger %s will not wait for you any longer and has withdrawn his offer. Your stats have been subtracted.
server.notify_mole_error_police: You cannot purchase a subscription as an Officer.
server.notify_mole_success: You purchased a subscription from %s to %s. He will inform you about officers in his area via Trap Phone.
server.mole_buy_webhook_desc: <@%s> (**%s, %s**) purchased a subscription from %s: %s valid until %s.
server.mole_buy_notify: You don't have enough cash on you, you are missing $%s.
server.mole_buy_notify2: Your respect is too low, you are missing %s.
server.mole_buy_notify3: You have an active subscription from %s to %s.
server.notify_traphone_error_police: You cannot purchase Trap Phone as an Officer.
server.traphone_buy_notify: You don't have enough cash on you, you are missing $%s.
server.print_retail_status2: The player you specified %s is unavailable or you cannot perform this via RCON.
server.notify_retail_status: Not enough policemen to start a retail business, lack of %s.
server.notify_retail_status3: You started selling drugs. Find potential customers.
server.notify_retail_police: Not enough policemen to continue retail sales, lack of %s.
server.notify_retail_error: You do not have the drug on offer.
server.notify_retail_error2: You don't have that much of the drug on offer.
server.notify_retail_error3: You offered the same or higher amount.
server.notify_wholesale: You've arrived at your destination, head towards the customer.
server.notify_wholesale2: You moved away from the meeting place, it was canceled and your statistics were deducted.
server.wholesale_webhook_desc: <@%s> (**%s, %s**) wandered too far from the meeting point with %s.
server.notify_wholesale3: You attacked an unknown merchant, your potential customers will probably find out about it. Your stats have been subtracted.
server.notify_wholesale4: The customer took the $%s you had with you.
server.notify_wholesale5: You stole $%s from a customer, run away before the officers get here!
server.notify_wholesale6: You don't have the offered drug on you, you've wasted the customer's time. Your stats have been subtracted.
server.notify_wholesale7: You don't have enough of the offered drug on you, you've wasted the customer's time. Your stats have been subtracted.

phone_mole_first_message: Hey, I'm operating in %s. I'll keep you posted if any pigs show up in the %s area. Watch your back.
Yo, I'm working in %s. I'll let you know if any pigs show up around %s. Stay alert.
Hi, I'm on %s. I'll inform you if any pigs are seen in %s. Keep an eye out.
Hey, I'm in %s. I'll update you if any pigs appear in the %s neighborhood. Be careful.
What's up, I'm at %s. I'll give you a heads-up if any pigs are spotted in the %s area. Stay safe.

html.notify_inventory_select: Select an item from your inventory
html.phone_call_message_end: Started a conversation that lasted %s seconds
html.notify_settings_error: You must wait 5 seconds before changing the settings again.

dialog_npc_first_message: How may I assist you at this moment?
dialog_npc_take: Okay, I'll take %s pieces of %s. How much do you want for one quantity?
Alright, I'd like to order %s units of %s. What's the price per unit?
I'll go for %s pieces of %s. Can you tell me the cost for each?
dialog_answer_start_normal: Are you up for an adventure?
Are you in the mood for something exciting?
Interested in trying something new and thrilling?
dialog_answer_start_exit: Actually, I think I'll pass this time, thanks.
I've reconsidered – maybe some other time. Thank you.
dialog_npc_whatYouHave: What goods do you have to offer today?
Can you show me what items are available for purchase right now?
I'm curious about your current selection. What's on offer today?
dialog_answer_whatYouHave_exit: On second thought, I have nothing right now.
Actually, upon rethinking, I currently don’t have anything to offer.
I’ve just realized that I don't have any items available at the moment.
dialog_answer_iWillTake_normal: Let me show you something else.
How about I introduce you to another one of our products?
Maybe you'd be interested in seeing a different item we have?
dialog_answer_iWillTake_exit: I've changed my mind, not selling it today.
Actually, I won't be selling it today.
dialog_npc_giveMeBetterOption: Give me a better price, this one doesn't suit me.
This price seems a bit high. Can you do any better?
I'm looking for a more reasonable price. Can we negotiate?
dialog_npc_noThanks: I'll pass on that, doesn't seem like a good deal.
I think I'll decline, the price doesn't work for me.
No thanks, the deal isn't quite what I'm looking for.
dialog_answer_noThanks_exit: That's a shame. Hopefully, we can do business in the future.
Sorry to hear that. Let's keep the possibility open for another time.
dialog_npc_sellSuccess: I'm interested in your offer. Let's make a deal.
This sounds good to me. I'd like to proceed with the deal.
I agree to these terms. Let's finalize the deal.
dialog_answer_sellSuccess_normal: Great, pleasure doing business with you.
Excellent, I'm glad we could come to an agreement.
Fantastic, it's been a pleasure arranging this with you.
dialog_npc_sellFail: That price doesn't work for me. No deal.
I can't agree to that price. We don't have a deal.
The price is too high for me. I'll have to pass.
dialog_answer_exit: Sorry we couldn't make it work. Perhaps in the future.
Understood, hope we can do business some other time.
phone_message_no_places: However, we won't make a deal, something went wrong on my side.
Unfortunately, I have to back out of this deal, there's been an issue on my end.
I've had a change of plans and can't proceed with the deal, sorry for the inconvenience.
phone_message_drug_amount_fail: You're funny, kid, thinking I'd need that much.
You must be joking with that amount.
That's a good one, but let's be serious about the quantity.
phone_message_price_question: How much do you want for one quantity?
Can you tell me the cost for each quantity?
phone_message_price_answer: The price for each quantity is $%s.
phone_message_call: Okay, call me for more information.
Alright, give me a call if there's more to discuss.
Sounds good. Please phone me for further details.
phone_message_price_fail: At that price? I think we're done here.
This price is a deal-breaker for me. Goodbye.
No way I'm paying that much. This conversation is over.
phone_message_price_negotiation: This price doesn’t work for me - give me a better offer.
I’m not paying that much. Show me a better deal.
The price doesn’t work for me — you’ll have to do better than that.
phone_message_price_no_req: Actually, I’ve changed my mind. Sorry for the trouble.
On second thought, I’ll pass. Apologies.
You know what? Forget it. Didn’t mean to waste your time.
phone_message_price_lower_before: That’s more than what you said earlier. You messing with me? Get lost.
You just raised the price? Seriously? Don’t screw with me — I’m out.
You think this is funny? Price went up? Piss off.
